title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Programming Fundamentals: Teacher Training for Gradual Skill Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational logical thinking skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Within four weeks, learners can systematically explain the four core programming skills (code tracing, syntax writing, template comprehension, and code writing using templates) in a step-by-step manner.
A progressive learning module is applied to achieve an 80% or higher completion rate for practical assignments and reduce error rates by 30%.
Develop and utilize at least three formative assessment tools (quizzes, pair programming observations) to evaluate code explanation proficiency.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
